“A person who is nice to you, but rude to the waiter, is not a nice person.”

Dave Barry

“If the world hates you,realize that it hated me first.
If you belonged to the world,the world would love its own; but because you do not belong to the world,& I have chosen you out of the world,the world hates you...If they persecuted me, they will also persecute you” Jn15:18-20

RT @SenBooker We should legalize marijuana AND help those who have suffered due to its prohibition.  My bill legalizes marijuana & aims to right some wrongs of our failed drug war which has had a disproportionately devastating impact on Americans of color & the poor. https://twitter.com/mic/status/987335214715285504 QT @mic There’s an undeniable racial double standard for white people vs people of color and prosecution for marijuana. On this #420, Sen. @CoryBooker doesn't just want us to start talking about it — he's trying to change it from the federal level. Crystal Perry of the Mashpee Wampanoag tribe in MA loved horses & her family. She & a friend were murdered in 2013 – the case remains unsolved. We must pass @SenatorHeitkamp’s #SavannasAct to help end these violent crimes against Native women.#NotInvisible http://www.capecodtimes.com/article/20130619/OBITS02/306190316
